summary: This mod adds one basic General Storage chest to each Town. You will need this mod first, General Stores - storage resource for packrats by Harvey2112  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?
descriptionHtml:
Use the Updated files, hopefully this fixes the clipping issues.

I use this mod all the time so that i am never away from my gear. I have never had any issues so i thought i'd share it with you all.
This mod adds one basic General Storage chest to each Town. You will need this mod first, General Stores - storage resource for packrats by Harvey2112 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?

Just download and enjoy. I also added a enchantment table to whiterun behind the blacksmithy.

I am not sure how this mod will go with mods that change the towns or add items, so b careful.

Let me know if you would like a chest added elsewhere.
author: Unspacey

files.name: updated file
files.changelogHtml: Moved some of the chests to remove the clipping issues.
